main_definition: A colloquial term used to describe a person, often in a dismissive or mocking manner.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Mockery of someone's intelligence or appearance
meanings_and_examples.example: She called him Judy because his ideas were so unoriginal.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used to refer to a woman in an affectionate or playful way by some people, especially when she is not present.
meanings_and_examples.example: We'll miss you all when Judy goes on vacation next week!

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal reference to a female judge or someone perceived as having judicial power
meanings_and_examples.example: Judy, can I ask for your ruling on this matter?
